basics.name: Eric Xiong
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Full Stack Developer with 5+ years of experience in React.js, Node.js, and web app development. Proven skills in improving application performance and implementing secure payment gateways. Looking to apply my technical expertise in a dynamic team to develop user-friendly solutions.

work.name: eCommerce Canada
work.summary: Developed and maintained web applications, focusing on improving performance and automating processes to enhance client efficiency.
highlights: Engineered a Shopify application using Node.js and React.js, automating product data processing, reducing manual effort by 50%.
Developed web applications utilizing Firebase and Next.js, incorporating serverless cloud functions and a real-time database.
responsibilities: Collaborated with senior developers to design and implement web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks.
Assisted in debugging and optimizing front-end code to ensure smooth user experiences.
Participated in code reviews and contributed to improving coding standards within the team.
achievements: Optimized server performance by introducing a task queue system, resolving server crash issues.
Integrated PayPal as a payment gateway, enabling secure and efficient online transactions.

work.name: Georgian College
work.summary: Worked as a Full Stack Developer, building and maintaining web interfaces and integrating backend services to support various projects.
highlights: Built and designed interfaces for web applications using React.
Developed and consumed REST endpoints within the Node.js/Express.js framework.
Wrote comprehensive API documentation for one of the key projects.
responsibilities: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop full-stack web solutions.
Integrated third-party data stored in Azure Storage into web applications.
Implemented Two-Factor Authentication to enhance security for web applications.
achievements: Successfully integrated secure third-party data handling and improved application security with Two-Factor Authentication.

work.name: MiGuy Digital Service
work.summary: Assisted in developing web applications, focusing on UI/UX design and mobile application interfaces.
highlights: Built and designed a car dealer web application from the ground up.
Designed and implemented user interfaces for mobile applications.
responsibilities: Collaborated with designers and developers to create responsive and user-friendly web applications.
Implemented UI/UX designs for mobile apps, ensuring a seamless user experience across devices.
Contributed to front-end development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
achievements: Delivered a fully functional car dealer web application that enhanced client engagement and sales.

volunteer.summary: Helped organize coding workshops and mentored new members.

projects.name: E-Card
projects.description: The E-card Generator can generate an online birthday or Christmas card with cool animation.
highlights: Implemented using Hooks for state management

projects.name: Toodoo
projects.description: TOODOO is a Task Management System with a resizable and draggable dashboard.
highlights: Features a fully customizable and dynamic dashboard

projects.name: LovingSitter
projects.description: LovingSitter is a beautiful, easy-to-use platform that dog owners can easily find a dog sitter when they need it most.
highlights: Built with Node.js, React.js, TypeScript, and MongoDB
Supports user authentication and secure payments
